thread.title: Pep Guardiola sits next to Russian supermodel while scouting Monaco against PSG ahead of Champions League clash
thread.title_full: Pep Guardiola sits next to Russian supermodel while scouting Monaco against PSG ahead of Champions League clash

author: smorgan
title: Pep Guardiola sits next to Russian supermodel while scouting Monaco against PSG ahead of Champions League clash
text:
Scouting with Girls Pep Guardiola sits next to Russian supermodel while scouting Monaco against PSG ahead of Champions League clash 
Manchester City boss posed for a photo alongside Victoria Lopyreva, who is Russia 2018 World Cup ambassador Pictured Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments PEP GUARDIOLA posed for a photo with a Russian supermodel as he scouted Monaco against Paris Saint-Germain last night. 
The Manchester City boss was getting the lowdown on the Ligue 1 leaders ahead of their Champions League clash. Instagram @lopyrevavika 6 Victoria Lopyreva poses next to Pep Guardiola at the Parc des Princes last night 
But he could have been forgiven for being somewhat distracted by the appearance of Russia 2018 World Cup ambassador Victoria Lopyreva next to him. 
Keep up to date with ALL the Manchester City news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
The television presenter smiled alongside under-pressure Guardiola, who has already admitted his side cannot win the Premier League this year . 
Lopyreva was crowned Miss Russia 2003 and is a self-confessed football nut. Instagram @lopyrevavika Victoria Lopyreva is an ambassador for the 2018 World Cup in Russia Instagram @lopyrevavika The blonde supermodel is a self-confessed football nut and took in PSG vs Monaco Instagram @lopyrevavika 6 Victoria Lopyreva has almost 1,000,000 followers on Instagram 
So she probably found she got on all right with the ex-Bayern Munich and Barcelona manager at the Parc des Princes. 
Guardiola, wearing a black corduroy hat and black and white scarf, was later joined in the stands by his assistant Mikel Arteta. 
Brazil legend Ronaldinho was also present as was former City chief Roberto Mancini. 
Guardiola’s side host Monaco at the Etihad in the Champions League on Tuesday, February 21. Instagram @lopyrevavika The glamorous model will be seen a lot in the run up to the 2018 World Cup Instagram @lopyrevavika Victoria Lopyreva also spends her time presenting shows on television Crystal Palace 0-3 Manchester City : Palace no match for City and go crashing out Related stories UP FOR THE CUP FA Cup fifth round draw: When is the draw, when are the games due to be played and what time does it start? UNITED ON FIRE Emergency services rush to Old Trafford as smoke is seen pouring from Manchester United's South Stand BURN BRADY BURN Burnley hoping to seal a £13million deal for Norwich's Republic of Ireland ace Robbie Brady TOON CHANCE ARM Crystal Palace and Newcastle in talks over Andros Townsend and Chancel Mbemba swap Gordon blue Chelsea make second bid for Celtic keeper Craig Gordon as Asmir Begovic replacement Wenger live Listen to Arsene Wenger's press conference ahead of tomorrow night's Premier League clash against Watford Make it a double Leicester want Gaston Ramirez and Anderlecht's £13m Kara Mbodji before window shuts OUI GOT PAYET Dimitri Payet completes £25m Marseille move as West Ham chief David Sullivan blasts his lack of respect ROO LEAVING? Wayne Rooney's Manchester United future in doubt as Jose Mourinho also confirms Ashley Young could leave Pure Precision Danny Welbeck's stunning opener is crowned the Gillette Precision Play of the FA Cup Fourth Round ALAN SHEARER Teams who rested players cheated their fans and showed a lack of respect for the FA Cup and their opposition Transfers live All the latest breaking news and gossip from the January transfer window 
And they do so knowing the free-scoring French club - who have bagged an astonishing 65 goals in 22 games - are prolific in front of goal. 
That is some 22 more than Guardiola's side have managed despite the attacking talents of Sergio Aguero and Kevin De Bruyne and Co.
